main event: One small reddish object was observed for several minutes drifting towards the Southwest, undulating and initially seen at zenith.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a few minutes,The witness is an amateur astronomer and a member of the Air Force Reserve,The object was moving southwest and undulating,It was suggested that the sighting was probably caused by a weather balloon,There were several airmen present at the time of the sighting who reported seeing nothing unusual.
